headline: IndiGo co-founder sells $1.36 billion of airline's shares, term sheet shows
summary: The co-founder of Indianairline IndiGo, Rakesh Gangwal, sold a 5.7% stake inthe low-cost carrier through a block deal worth about $1.36billion, a term sheet showed on Tuesday. The...
